scripts.build: npm --prefix ../api run build && rm -rf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && mkdir -p dist/contract/src/managed && (cp -R ../contract/src/managed/claim dist/contract/src/managed/ || echo 'Contract managed directory not found - skipping copy')
scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.standalone: npm run build && docker compose -f ../docker-compose.yml pull && node dist/launcher/standalone.js
